#CLEANSync developers' guide

==Development Platform==

CLEANSync is developed using .NET Visual C#. 
----
==Components==
[http://cleansync.googlecode.com/files/CLEANSync%20components.jpg]
===GUI===
CLEANSync uses WPF to implement the user interface. 

===Logics===
See: [http://code.google.com/p/cleansync/wiki/LogicComponents Logics Component]
The logics component form the underlying engine of CLEANSync. This component is in charge of handling all calculation and work.


===MetaData===
MetaData classes store various information used by CLEANSync to perform its operations. 

*Classes*
  * ComponentMeta
   * [http://code.google.com/p/cleansync/wiki/ComponentMeta#FileMeta FileMeta]
   * [http://code.google.com/p/cleansync/wiki/ComponentMeta#FolderMeta FolderMeta]
  * JobDefinition
   * [http://code.google.com/p/cleansync/wiki/JobDefinition#PCJob_Class_Description PCJob]
   * [http://code.google.com/p/cleansync/wiki/JobDefinition#USBJob_Class_Description USBJob]
  * [http://code.google.com/p/cleansync/wiki/Differences Differences ]
  * ComparisonResult 
  * [http://code.google.com/p/cleansync/wiki/Conflict Conflict]
